thread.title: Extended Stay in the City
thread.title_full: Extended Stay in the City - Review of AKA Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Scott A
title: Extended Stay in the City
text: Excellent stay at the AKA hotel Central Park. The location is fantastic next to the park and between 5th and 6th. The was staff very friendly and helpful. The room was very quite, clean and large. The AKA chain is now on my radar and plan to make this hotel my standard in NYC.
